member.name: T:CLMath.CLAESMath
member.summary: A Library for all AES Math

member.name: M:CLMath.CLAESMath.DecryptStringAES(System.String)
member.summary: Decrypts a Encrypted Base64 to String

member.name: M:CLMath.CLAESMath.EncryptStringAES(System.String)
member.summary: Encrypts a String using AES128 Encryption

member.name: T:CLMath.CLConverter
member.summary: Class for converting one type to another

member.name: M:CLMath.CLConverter.ToInt32(System.String)
member.summary:
Converts String to a 32bit Integer
Returns -1 if it failed to convert

member.name: M:CLMath.CLConverter.ToInt64(System.String)
member.summary:
Converts String to a 64bit Integer
Returns -1 if it failed to convert

member.name: M:CLMath.CLConverter.ToReal32(System.String)
member.summary:
Converts String to a 32bit Real
Returns -1 if it failed to convert

member.name: M:CLMath.CLConverter.ToReal64(System.String)
member.summary:
Converts String to a 64bit Real
Returns -1 if it failed to convert

member.name: M:CLMath.CLConverter.DecodeBase64(System.String)
member.summary: Decodes base64 string to plain text
